item.description:
TIME CHANGED TO 4:30 PM!!

The host is a fellow pub crawler, Duncan.

This spookalicious spooktacular meetup is co-posted with Boston Social Fitness, Social Fun, Fun with Alcohol, & to Facebook.

4:30 PM-- descend into the depths!
Charlies Kitchen-- outdoors in the foundation of a house basement!
It is "heated by a stove". (We'll meet indoors if rain or cold)

5:15-- Shays, 58 JFK St. A semi-cellar. Downstairs.

6:00 PM--Spooky Silent Disco with the Boston Society of Spontaneity. Winthrop Park:
http://www.yelp.com/biz/winthrop-park-cambridge
See details w/ Social Fun
http://www.meetup.com/SocialFun/events/81160942/
Boogie info:
http://bostinno.com/2012/10/25/boston-halloween-pub-crawl-places-to-go-parties/

6:45-- Russell House Tavern. (Downstairs!) NEW!http://www.russellhousecambridge.com/

7:30, Grendel's Den-- downstairs. Grendels has half price menu specials at this hour, w/ the purchase of a min. $3.50 drink, but don't be late!

8:15 PM: Tommy Doyles-- cellar opens at 6 PM.

9 PM-- Pizzeria Uno's --downstairs!

9:45PM: John Harvards brewery (downstairs!)

Adorn yourselves if you so please with bells, masks or capes, or flounces/ ribands even false mustaches, eyeballs, or makeup.

PLEASE BRING CASH! NO GOBLINS WELCOME, please!
item.how_to_find_us: Prowl around in the basements at times stated.
item.name: Cellar Dweller Pub Crawl
